channel.title: Just a few glitches
channel.description:
So first of all, when you buy items from a shop you can't sell them back to that shop! Why would this be?
Second of all. The "I buy anything store" when you value an item to sell to it, it will say something like for example "3000001" but when you actually sell it, it sells for a completely different price.

item.title: Just a few glitches
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

So first of all, when you buy items from a shop you can’t sell them back to that shop! Why would this be?

Second of all. The “I buy anything store” when you value an item to sell to it, it will say something like for example “3000001” but when you actually sell it, it sells for a completely different price.

Read full topic
